column4: I need help editing my xorg.conf file to add the option, Option "UseEDID" "FALSE", so that I can set to video modes above 640X480 in my Nvidia driver?
doesn't the nvidia.run driver do that automatically for you?
then edit it and see if it works
have you checked what driver you are using in the xorg.conf?? is it the restricted one or the normal one?
